#summary qsLogo documentation.

= qsLogo 1.0 =

== Supported Primitives ==

=== Turtle Primitives ===
{{{
xcor, ycor
get turtle x
get turtle y
pen up (pu)
pen down (pd)
forward x (fd, fw)
back x (bk)
right degrees (rt)
left degrees (lt)
home
circle radius
clear screen (cs)
}}}

=== Math ===

{{{
sum x y
dif x y
div x y
prod x y

neg x ; Negate
sqr x ; Square
sqrt x; Square Root

}}}

=== Variables ===

{{{
make variable value
thing variable
:variable
}}}

=== Function Definition ===
{{{
to function
    statements  
end
}}}

=== Control Statements ===

{{{
repeat times [block]
stop
bye
}}}

=== Input/Output ===
{{{
edit file ; Opens File
print expression ( Prints expression )
}}}
